mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(userid, userpw, username, sex, birth, email, zip, addr1, addr2, phone, hp, dept, job, day) Values (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{username}, #{sex}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{zip}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{phone}, #{hp}, #{dept}, #{job}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select userid from tbl_member where userid = #{userId}
